metadata.name: 1. Young Lovers
metadata.description:
Brighton, England, 2015.  
 
Artist: Matt Humphrey  
Original black & white 35mm film scan.

Taken on Leica M6 film camera with Kodak Tri-X 400 film.

Artist Note: 
This is one of my favourite 35mm film photographs I've taken. One of those epic snapshots of life, and love - two young lovers caught in a moment that lasts forever. 

Shot on my favourite lens - the 35mm Summilux f1.4 - this image has not been cropped, and was composed in camera.

The grain of the film, the dirty street, the guitars in the music shop window that form the backdrop, the clothes all lend themselves to a timeless moment.

Utility: Owners of this NFT will gain access to the presale of the artist's next collection drop, as of May 2022.

Image dimensions: 5444 X 3649px

License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
